languages.text: "Пусть... так... лишь бы поквитаться... с тобой!" {n}Кунрад клонится к земле, но голос его по-прежнему исполнен кипучей злобы.{/n}
"So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пусть... так... лишь бы поквитаться... с тобой!" {n}Кунрад клонится к земле, но голос его по-прежнему исполнен кипучей злобы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir bends down, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

traits.locale_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: “我愿意……只要我……能杀了你！”{n}维特威尔弯下了腰，但声音中依然充满了恶意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我愿意……只要我……能杀了你！”{n}维特威尔弯下了腰，但声音中依然充满了恶意。{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: « Peu importe... tant que je peux... me venger de vous ! » {n}Voigtvir se plie en deux, mais sa voix bouillonne avec toujours autant de malveillance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Peu importe... tant que je peux... me venger de vous ! » {n}Voigtvir fléchit, mais sa voix bouillonne avec toujours autant de malveillance.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: 「それならそれでいい…お前に…復讐できるならな！」{n}ボイトヴィルはくずおれるものの、その声はまだ悪意に満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それならそれでいい…お前に…復讐できるならな！」{n}ボイトヴィルはくずおれるものの、その声はまだ悪意に満ちている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: «¡No me importa... mientras pueda... vengarme de ti!». {n}Voigtvir se dobla de dolor, pero su voz rezuma malicia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No me importa... mientras pueda... vengarme de ti!». {n}Voigtvir se dobla por el dolor, pero su voz rezuma malicia.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "So sei es ... so lange ich ... mich an Euch rächen kann!" {n}Voigtvir krümmt sich, doch seine Stimme trieft noch immer vor Tücke.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So sei es ... so lange ich ... mich an Euch rächen kann!" {n}Voigtvir beugt sich hinunter, doch seine Stimme trieft noch immer vor Tücke.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "Öyle olsun... Senden... İntikam aldığım sürece... Her yol mübahtır!" {n}İki büklüm olsa da Voigtvir'in sesinden hâlâ melanet akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it... as long as I... get my revenge on you!" {n}Voigtvir doubles over, but his voice is still seething with malice.{/n}
